summary: React Query cache invalidation bug fixed: bookmark state not updating in list view after toggling on detail page. Created comprehensive development guidelines document to prevent similar issues.
key_learnings: Prefix-based cache invalidation: queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['search'] }) invalidates all queries starting with ['search', ...]
Must invalidate ALL related query keys when data appears in multiple UI locations (detail page, list page, search results)
Development guidelines documentation prevents recurring bugs by establishing consistent patterns
React Query cache synchronization requires understanding data flow across entire application
problems_solved: Bookmark state not syncing between SessionDetail and Sessions list pages
Missing cache invalidation for search queries when bookmark toggled
Lack of developer documentation for React Query best practices
code_patterns: Comprehensive mutation â†’ invalidation pattern for data consistency
notes: This session demonstrates effective bug fixing with preventive documentation
Created DEVELOPMENT_GUIDELINES.md with comprehensive React Query patterns
Updated SessionDetail.tsx and Sessions.tsx for cache consistency
Total files modified: 4 (2 code files, 2 documentation files)
